
Antonio - Explore CrimeData

-----

```{r setup}
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
crimedata <- 
  vroom(here("data", "CrimeData-2022.csv")) %>% 
  mutate(
    OccurDate = mdy(OccurDate),
    ReportDate = mdy(ReportDate)
  )

crimedata
```

```{r}
neighborhoods <- read_sf(here("data", "Neighborhoods_(Regions).geojson"))

neighborhoods %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf()
```
